description: This React component, UploadForm.jsx, provides a user interface for uploading .ts video files along with associated metadata such as title, description, tags, video metadata, audio tracks, and subtitles. It includes form management, validation, and integration with an API client to handle the upload process.

methods.name: addAudio
methods.description: Adds a new empty audio track entry to the list of audio tracks.

methods.name: removeAudio
methods.description: Removes an audio track at a specified index from the list of audio tracks.

methods.name: setAudioField
methods.description: Updates a specific field (language, codec, channels) for an audio track at a given index.

methods.name: addSub
methods.description: Adds a new empty subtitle track entry to the list of subtitles.

methods.name: removeSub
methods.description: Removes a subtitle track at a specified index from the list of subtitles.

methods.name: setSubField
methods.description: Updates a specific field (language, format) for a subtitle track at a given index.

methods.name: onSubmit(e)
methods.description: Handles form submission: validates file input, calls createUpload API, resets form, handles errors, and manages busy state.
